title: Shooting on Simcoe Street
content:
LAFAYETTE La.
Lafayette police are investigating a shooting that happened outside a night club on Simcoe street over night. A 31-year old black male victim with a gun shot wound in the parking lot was found, he was transported to a local hospital where he is now in stable condition. No suspect has been captured at this time.
The investigation is still ongoing.. anyone with any information is asked to call the Lafayette Police Department or Crime Stoppers at 232 tips.
